column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Zarwarkur hopes you are hungry for knowledge.
Deliver the tulidile meat to Zarwarkur.
Well met, traveler! By the look of you, I presume you know how to hunt, yes? Would you be interested to learn how we prepare our traditional jerky?
In exchange, all I ask is that you supply the main ingredient, as my stock is running low.
For this, we will require tulidile meat. Head north of our village and look for a specimen worthy of salting!
You should be able to find tulidiles in their natural habitat just north of here. Best of luck!
Oooh, now there's a beautiful slab! Barely any fat to trim. A quick coating of salt and we should be well on our way to some mouthwatering jerky!
The key, you see, is to lay the meat strips in a well-lit area with cool, dry air. Good thing we're on top of a mountain, eh?

The Dawnservant himself once tasted my jerky many years ago. The Head of Resolve liked it so much, he wolfed it down in moments! <chuckle> I can still recall the Head of Reason's look of disgust. “Must you inhale it!?”
Ah, but this is no time to reminisce about the old days. There is work to be done, and this tulidile meat will make a scrumptious jerky with just the right amount of chew.
While you were hunting, I cooked you a little treat for later. Consider it your payment for replenishing my stock!
